eventDecorators.name: AdminUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: Locked
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: TokenContractUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: Unlocked
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

functionDecorators.name: allowedAmount
functionDecorators.description: Checks the authorized amount of an admin account.

functionDecorators.name: lock
functionDecorators.description: User locks token and initiates teleport request.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unlock
functionDecorators.description: Admin unlocks token upon receiving teleport request from Flow.

functionDecorators.name: updateAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Updates the admin status of an account. Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateTokenAddress
functionDecorators.description: Owner updates the target lockup token address.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Owner withdraws token from lockup contract.
